participant_1.background:
I just graduated from college two years ago.
I have one cat.
I share an apartment in seattle with two roommates.
I am a kindergarten teacher.

participant_2.background:
I love to ride my bike.
I love caring for people.
I have two dogs and one cat.
I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
I have three grown children and six grandchildren.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to ride my bike! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
That sounds fun! I love to ride my bike too. Where do you like to ride your bike?
I love to ride my bike around my neighborhood. It's a great way to get to know my neighbors and see what's going on in the community.
That's great! I love seeing my neighbors too. Do you ever go on bike rides outside of your neighborhood?
I do! I love to take bike rides to the beach or the park. It's a great way to get out of the house and enjoy the fresh air.
That sounds amazing! I love going to the beach too. What do you like to do at the beach?
I love to swim, sunbathe, and play beach volleyball. It's a great place to relax and have fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been good at beach volleyball, but I love swimming and sunbathing.
You should try beach volleyball! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to get some exercise.
I'll have to try it sometime!
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm glad we're both into biking. It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I agree! It's a great way to relax and have fun.
